website_summaries.verdict: Good size of a dresser that works great in a nursery and will continue to work well as your baby ages.
pros: Larger than most nursery dresser options, giving you a lot of storage capacity in the six drawers
Will work as a changing table with a large top area, so it can save you some space in your nursery
Simple design that should fit in most rooms
cons: Installation requires at least two people because of heavy parts

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality and Design
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality! Don’t purchase this dresser. Ours fell apart within a few months, and the seller will not compensate us in anyway. The base of the drawer isn’t strong enough to hold clothing. Because of it’s flinsiness, the bottom drops out. The drawers are designed with a “safety” catch thay makes them difficult to open. Because of this, the front of the drawers are popping off. For $200, you’d think you’d have a dresser that lasted longer than a couple months!
customer_reviews.author: alarsen

customer_reviews.title: Nice on the outside, complete junk on the inside
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking dresser. Unfortunately, there is a poor element of the design where screws that are set into the cheap particle board that comprise the sides of the drawers do not have any nuts/pintels, etc. holding them in place. So when, in my case, even very little and gentle use happens, it is just a matter of time before the threading on the particle board wears out, and the drawers (except for the outside face) fall apart. that includes drawers that have only been open maybe half a dozen times in thecouple years we've had it. The product should last at least a few years as sold without falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: Looks great Assembled, but structurally weak
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was really easy, instructions were intuitive, but interior support boards were very weak. Top piece was cracked on both corners, interior support board was particle board cracked in half, and when I requested replacement hardware to finish assembly of one of the drawers I never received any response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and don’t purchase this!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and purchase something else! I cannot believe the quality of this dresser for $200. When we received the dresser, I needed to call the company in order to get all new front dresser panels. They were cracked, chipped paint and broken. Thankfully the company sent new front panels free of charge, but those all had dents and chipped paint as well. The dresser is very cheaply made and thin. I am extremely disappointed in the quality of this dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Potter

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this dresser before and have received it damaged with a big dent and crack in the front. But it was no biggie since I thought it might be shipping damages. Now I needed another one and it has to match the existing dresser I had so I decide to buy another one. This one I received it completely damaged and broken. It was damaged in the exact same spot as the one I had bought prior. Not only that, there is a huge gap as you can see in the picture. To put it short.. this dresser is not worth it, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Great nursery dresser!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dresser. We are using it in our daughters nursery. It’s very sturdy and holds a lot! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nursery Dresser
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the nursery. 16 months later and it's doing well. For easiest assembly, be sure to have 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but was missing parts. I followed every direction and it’s definitely not the sturdiest thing. But hasn’t fallen over so whatever
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: South shore great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The dresser was easy to assemble, looks beautiful and south shore is an amazing company. One of the pieces was miss cut so I had to call them. They were very kind about it and got me the replacement part right away. They even called me back to let me know they had been a 2 day delay in sending the part out.
customer_reviews.author: LCossor

customer_reviews.title: Poor materials and construction
customer_reviews.text: The thing fell apart when it was moved. Poor materials and construction. Sending it back which is a big difficult because of the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jane F Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: The front side of two drawers have come off and the bottom has bent and fallen out of a third. I am going to have to buy new furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy J. Muoio

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dresser
customer_reviews.text: Really nice dresser. One of the drawers were damaged when it arrived but the company replaced it right away. Its heavy and maybe they dropped it during the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Alexius

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: its white big & beautiful perfect for my daughters bedroom, will not lie took my husband couple hours to put together, quite a challenge, but well worth it sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Calvillo

customer_reviews.title: I love that it fits a changing table on top
customer_reviews.text: I love that it fits a changing table on top ! My husband put it together maybe took 2 hrs ( each draw has to be put together) first order received the top of damaged I called and they sent a new top right away no charge!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great dresser but drawers could be deeper like the face of the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: ryantech

customer_reviews.title: Also the materials used are so cheap I wouldnt recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Dresser came damaged out of the box. Also the materials used are so cheap I wouldnt recommend this to anyone. The back of the dresser was actually cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Anatoliy F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Slightly tricky to set up but looks really great once it's done!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good size, and it doesn’t look cheap.
customer_reviews.text: It takes a long time to assemble, and it’s not easy, but it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a sturdy dresser. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Such a sturdy dresser. Well made. Directions, once read and you pay close attention to the picture, it was easy to assemble. :LOVE it
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Wallace

customer_reviews.title: It came damaged. Obviously from the manufacturer. I ...
customer_reviews.text: It came damaged. Obviously from the manufacturer. I do not want to return the whole thing, but that is the only way they will replace. Box was not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wells

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible materials. I have had this dresser for 1 month and one of the drawers is already broken. Using it in a child's room so it's lightly used and still fell apart!!! Do not buy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Came a day early! Pretty heavy but sturdy. Not too hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Dresser came damaged in many areas...dings on drawer edges and dresser top edges...very dissatisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mohr

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality for the price. Some parts came damaged. I don’t see this furniture lasting long without repair. Very small even for a kids dresser.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: Seems solid for the price and is nice aesthetically. My only complaint is that one of the front pieces showed up broken, rather than returning the whole unit, he fixed the broken piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

product_meta.title: South Shore Callesto 6-Drawer Double Dresser, Pure White with Dull Nickel Handles
product_meta.description: Callesto: A collection of furniture in a timeless style that gives you a lot of décor options! Whether your kid wants a room with lots of color or a more classic look, this dresser will blend with the ambiance while adding some handy storage space. You’ll be happy with this piece for years to come! Metal handles in a Dull Nickel finish. Profiled drawer fronts. Metal drawer slides, for smooth gliding. Drawer dimensions #1: 22.625'' (L) x 13.625'' (D) x 4.375'' (H). Meets or exceeds all North American safety standards. Accessories not included. Requires complete assembly by 2 adults (tools not included). 52'' (W) x 19.375'' (D) x 31.125'' (H). Box dimensions: 59.528'' (L) x 20.118'' (W) x 6.3'' (H), 123 lb. Ships in a heavy box, make sure to have a friend with you. Packaging tested and certified to reduce the risk of damage during shipment. Made in North America with non-toxic laminated particleboard. 5-year quality guarantee. Any questions? Contact South Shore, the manufacturer, available 7/7 by phone, email or chat.
feature_bullets: Metal handles in a dull nickel Finish
Profiled drawer fronts, for a Classic touch
Metal drawer slides, for smooth gliding
Made in Canada with non-toxic laminated particleboard
Requires complete assembly by 2 adults (tools not included); 5-year Quality

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars57 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
